ssot__Account__dlm.name: Account
ssot__Account__dlm.description: The Account DMO represents how a party wants to interact with your company.

ssot___AccountBusinessType__c.description: The business type of the account.

ssot___Description__c.description: A text description of the contact account.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the account DMO.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the contact account.

ssot__number__c.description: The number assigned to the contact account.

ssot__AccountOwnershipType__c.description: The ownership type of the account.

ssot__AccountRatingType__c.description: The rating type of the account.

ssot__AccountTypeId__c.description: The reference ID for the type of contact account, for example, a loyalty account or business credit account.

ssot__AccountWebsiteURL__c.description: The website URL for the account.

ssot__AnnualRevenueAmount__c.description: The annual revenue amount for the account.

ssot__AssignTerritoryFlag__c.description: An indicator if an account needs an assigned territory.

ssot__AutoPayEnabledFlag__c.description: An indicator if auto pay is enabled for this contact.

ssot__AutoPaymentAmount__c.description: The amount to be automatically paid next time.

ssot__AutoPaymentAmountCurrency__c.description: The currency of the auto payment amount.

sot__AutoPaymentMethodId__c.description: A reference ID for the payment method for auto pay, for example a credit card or bank account.

ssot__BalanceAmount__c.description: The number in an account balance, for example, 100 points, 3 miles, or 6 visits.

ssot__BalanceAmountLimit__c.description: The max balance allowed, for example a credit limit.

ssot__BalanceUnitOfMeasureId__c.description: A reference ID for the unit of measure for balance, for example money, points, or miles.

ssot__BalanceUnitOfMeasureCurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID for the currency type used if balance unit of measure is money.

ssot__BillContactAddressId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact point billing address.

ssot__BillDeliveryMethodId__c.description: A reference ID for the preference to send the bill via electronic or physical mail delivery.

ssot__BillFrequency__c.description: The frequency for billing the account.

ssot__ContactPointAddressId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact point address.

ssot__ContactPointAppId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact point app.

ssot__ContactPointEmailId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact point email.

ssot__ContactPointLocationId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact point location.

ssot__ContactPointPhoneId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact point phone.

ssot__ContactPointSocialId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact point social.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DefaultFreightTermsId__c.description: A reference ID to the standard freight terms for this contact for example, Free On Board Shipping Point (FOB).

ssot__DefaultPriceBookId__c.description: A reference ID to the standard price book for this contact.

ssot__EffectiveDate__c.description: The effective date of the record.

ssot__EndDate__c.description: The end date of the record.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FaxPhoneId__c.description: A reference ID to the fax number for the account.

ssot_GeneralLedgerAccountId__c.description: A reference ID for a contact’s financial account where credit and debits are posted.

ssot__HoldStatusReasonId__c.description: A reference ID for the reason why the account is on hold.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID for the individual associated with the account.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the account is active.

ssot__IsCustomer__c.description: An indicator if the account is a customer account.

ssot__IsInternal__c.description: An indicator if the account is an internal account.

ssot__IsPartner__c.description: An indicator if the account is a partner account.

ssot__IsSeller__c.description: An indicator if the account is a seller account.

ssot__IsSupplier__c.description: An indicator if the account is a supplier account.

ssot__LastActivityDate__c.description: The date of the most recent account activity.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__NextInteractionDate__c.description: The date when the account should be contacted again.

ssot__NextReviewDate__c.description: The date when the account should be reviewed again.

ssot__OperatingHoursId__c.description: A reference ID to the operating hours associated with the account.

ssot__OrderDeliveryMethodId__c.description: A reference ID to the standard method for delivery such as overnight or in-person pickup.

ssot__OrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the account organization.

ssot__ParentAccountId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent contact account.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group. :::tip This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.:::

ssot__PartyObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated party object.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__PartyWebAddressId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated party web address.

ssot__PaymentTerm__c.description: The payment term for the account.

ssot__PrimaryIndustry__c.description: The primary industry for the account.

ssot__PrimarySalesContactPointId__c.description: A reference ID for the best way to communicate with the contact regarding sales.

ssot__PrimarySalesRepId__c.description: A reference ID for the sales owner of the account.

ssot__ReviewFrequency__c.description: The frequency for reviewing the account.

ssot__SalesPhoneId__c.description: A reference ID for the phone number for this account.

ssot__ShippingAddressId__c.description: A reference ID for the shipping billing address.

ssot__ShippingContactId__c.description: A reference ID for the shipping contact.

ssot__ShippingEmailId__c.description: A reference ID for the email used for shipping inquiries.

ssot__ShippingPhoneId__c.description: A reference ID for the phone for shipping inquiries.

ssot__SLAExpirationDate__c.description: The date when a Service Level Agreement (SLA) expires.

ssot__SLATypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact’s Service Level Agreement (SLA) type.

ssot__SourceSystemIdentifier__c.description: The identifier for the source system.

ssot__SourceSystemModifiedDateTime__c.description: The date and time for when the source system was modified.

ssot__UseAsBillingAccount__c.description: An indicator if the account is used for billing purposes.

ssot__UseAsSalesAccount__c.description: An indicator if the account is used for sales.

ssot__UseAsServiceAccount__c.description: An indicator if the account is used for service.

ssot__UseAsShippingAccount__c.description: An indicator if the account is used for shipping purposes.

ssot__WebsiteAddr__c.description: The website address for the account.
